title: A Bimodal Longitudinal Investigation on Changes in Sentiments over Social Media Interactions Owing to COVID-19 Pandemic

yaml.title: A Bimodal Longitudinal Investigation on Changes in Sentiments over Social Media Interactions Owing to COVID-19 Pandemic
yaml.description: This study analyzes sentiment shifts on Twitter during the COVID-19 pandemic, revealing significant changes in both text and image sentiment, with negative text sentiment increasing by 10.55% and positive image sentiment decreasing by 24.52%, and introduces a novel bimodal sentiment analysis framework.
